General.changeStart: It looks like it's time for a diaper change! Let's check just to be sure.
General.brandSelect: Yep, it definitely looks like you need a change, kiddo.\n What kind of diaper do you want to wear?
General.changeConfirm: *With the correct changing supplies on hand, Ralsei gives an inviting pat to the changing table* \n **"Alright, let's get you changed into a fresh diaper!"**
General.changeDeny: *Ralsei gives a disappointed look* \n **"Aww, are you sure?  You're pretty wet, you know..."**
General.change: *Ralsei lays you down on the changing table, undoing your diaper and wiping you clean with a baby wipe.  He then lifts your legs up and slides a fresh diaper under you, sprinkling on some baby powder before taping it up snugly.* \n **"All done!  You're all clean and dry now!"**
General.changeEnd: *Ralsei gives a gentle pat to your diapered rear, along with a biiiiiig hug* \n **"All done!  Run along now, kiddo!"**
General.title: __Diaper Change__

check.text: ***Ralsei hooks a finger along the inside your leak guards, observing the front of your diaper for any faded indicators*** \n **Let's see if you're wet...**

dry.text: ***Ralsei gently prods a digit in your leg guards, checking for wetness. He raises his eyebrows in surprise*** \n **Oh! Wow, I guess you're still dry, huh?**

damp.text: ***Ralsei feels around for some wetness and notes any lightly faded indicators on your diaper*** \n **Hmm, looks like you're a little damp, but not too bad!**

wet.text: ***Ralsei gives a gentle squeeze to the front of your diaper, causing it to squish*** \n **You're pretty wet!  We might want to change you soon before you leak!**

soaked.text: ***Ralsei withdraws a finger from your diaper, noting the wetness on his finger as he gives a squeeze to your soggy diaper front*** \n **Oh, wow, you're __soaked__!  That diaper's not going to hold any more, let's get you changed before you leak!**

leaking.text: ***Ralsei presses a finger against the front of your diaper, noting the wetness on his finger as he gives a squeeze to your soggy diaper front.  As more wetness drips down to the floor, he gives a slightly worried expression.*** \n **Oh, wow, you're __leaking__!  It's time to change before you leave an even bigger puddle!**

check.text: ***Ralsei sniffs the air and tugs on the back of your diaper to check for any other accidents*** \n **Now, let's check back here...**

clean.text: ***Ralsei smiles and pats your diapered rear*** \n **You're all clean back here!**

littleMessy.text: ***Ralsei sniffs the air with a slight frown*** \n **Hmm, looks like you had a little accident back here, huh... \n It's not too bad, we probably could wait on a change for a little bit!**

kindaMessy.text: ***Ralsei's nose wrinkles*** \n **Oh, wow, you're pretty messy back here!  We should probably get you changed soon!** \n *He says, giving a gentle squish to your diapered rear.*

veryMessy.text: ***Ralsei's face scrunches and he pinches his nose*** \n **Phew, I don't even need to check to know you're messy back here!  Come on, let's get you up on that changing table and cleaned up!**
